amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for contracts to entities that have violated the Fair Labor Standards Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for contracts to entities that have violated the Fair Labor Standards Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A069) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 243 (Roll no. 324).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
